name: ts-ssg
description: A static site generator using typescript, react and marked

scripts.prepush: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.release:major: npm run prepush && changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --no-verify -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run prepush && changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --no-verify -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run prepush && changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --no-verify -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags

author: Tim Schumacher
